net.trajano.sonar.plugins.reverseproxyauth

Class ReverseProxyAuthSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.trajano.sonar.plugins.reverseproxyauth.ReverseProxyAuthSettings

  • @ServerSide
public class ReverseProxyAuthSettings
extends Object
    Wraps the settings object so it provides a type safe interface rather than using strings. This class also provides the property key constants.
    Author:
    Archimedes

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ALLOW_NEW_USERS
      If true, then new users that are not yet registered in the system are automatically registered.
      static String HEADER_NAME
      HTTP Header name containing the user name.
      static String LOCALHOST
      Host name to allow sonar executions.
      private org.sonar.api.config.Settings settings
      Wrapped settings.

      • LOCALHOST

        public static final String LOCALHOST
        Host name to allow sonar executions. Authentication will always be accepted when accessing this host name from the HttpServletRequest.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public String getUserNameFromHeader(@Nonnull
